answers.answer: I've been on bed rest for 3 weeks and I'm 27 + 2. I was a customer service rep so I sat at my desk. I started to notice that it was getting extremely hard to breathe to the point I was about to pass out and the only way to feel better was to lay on my left side. I left work early to go to the ER and was placed on bed rest since then. My iron is low so standing was really hard. I have 3 other kids at home and my fiance helps me a lot. My oldest daughter is a big help as well.

I am on bed rest. I have 2 other children 6 and 4 my husband helps me out. I do little stuff around the house but nothing major. I am on bed rest due to losing so much weight and te baby not getting enough.

I was on bed rest my last two pregnancy it was really complected when at the time my oldest was 5 and I was a single parent I couldn't do much but lay in the bed. But I disobeyed the doctor because I felt really guilty because my 5 yr old was my life and I always felt like I was letting him down. But now I'm 34+6 and now got the help. But I truly think its a mind thing. You can do it weather you gave help or not. Don't do what I did cause I didn't listen to the doc and continue to move around I had my Lil one a month early. But congrats and good luck
I'm on bed rest now in 28 weeks n 3 days due to cervix shortening
I'm 36+5 and I have been on bed rest since I was 30weeks. I'm on bed rest for potential preeclampsia. I don't have it, but my blood pressure fluctuates.

question: Are any of you on bed rest? What for and whose helping you? Like what's your plan if you have other kids and were put on bed rest are you getting help from your spouse, boyfriend or family.?
title: Bedrest?
